casebody.data:
GANT
v.
JACKSON. No. 458P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006.

Rick Jackson, Pro Se.

Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2006 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-28(B)(1)(2)(3)(4)":

*805"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
